skill_1.descSkill:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on melee tiles.
Active: Ling and her summons gain +20% ATK and +20 ASPD. The summons deal Arts damage
Immediately gain 1 summon when the skill is activated

skill_2.descSkill:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on ranged tiles and deals Arts damage
Active: Ling and her summons deal 250% ATK as Arts damage to 2 enemies within Attack Range and Bind them for 1.5 seconds.
After the skill ends, retrieve all summons with less than 50% HP; Can store 1 charge(s)

skill_3.descSkill:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on melee tiles. If there are other summons within their attack range, combines them into a Higher form.
Active: Ling and her summons gain +40% ATK and +40% DEF. Each summon deals 20% of Ling's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles every 0.5 second.
After the skill ends, gain 1 summon

skill_1.descSkill: DEF +25%, ATK +10%, and normal attacks now deal Arts damage

skill_2.descSkill: Stops attacking; DEF +60%, Block +1, upon receiving an enemy attack, deals Arts damage to the attacker equal to 50% of Nian's ATK and silences them for 3 seconds

skill_3.descSkill: ATK +55%; Nearby allied Operators gain DEF +30%, Block +1 and status resistance

skill_1.descSkill:
The next attack has increased splash area and deals 150% ATK as Arts damage
Can store 1 charges

skill_2.descSkill: Range expands, ATK +20%, ASPD +20 and attacks all enemies within range. Increase Arts damage dealt to enemies with less than 50% HP to 115%

skill_3.descSkill: Attack Interval increases and prioritize attacking unblocked enemies. Range and splash area expand, ATK +40% and every attack summons/refreshes a "Freeling" (lasts for 25 seconds) at the target's location (only on deployable ground tiles)

skill_1.descSkill:
The next attack restores HP equal to 110% ATK to a nearby friendly unit with less than 50% HP
Can store 1 charge

skill_2.descSkill:
Stops attacking to focus on healing up to 2 allied units within range; ATK +30%; Block +1; Talent 1 effect increases to 1.2x
Heals will use a special attack interval

skill_3.descSkill: Healing range expands, attacks now also heal allied Operators; ATK +10%. If there are ground enemies on sowed tiles, all allied units within skill range gains +10% ATK and +10 ASPD; When an enemy passes through a sowed tile, it gains the following effect: Teleport back to this location after moving more than 4 tiles away

skill_1.descSkill: ATK +30%, each attack restores HP to this unit equal to 25% of the damage dealt

skill_2.descSkill: Attack Range expands, ATK +80%, DEF +30%; When attacking unblocked enemies, pulls them towards this unit moderately

skill_3.descSkill: ATK +70%, ASPD +40, Block +2; While this skill is active, this unit only takes 50% of incoming damage, with the remaining amount dealt as HP loss over 20 seconds after this skill ends

skill_1.descSkill:
ATK +25% and DEF +25%. When attacked, deals 70% of ATK as Arts damage to the attacker.
Unlimited duration

skill_2.descSkill: Attack Range expands, ATK +80%, DEF +30%; When attacking unblocked enemies, pulls them towards this unit moderately

skill_3.descSkill: ATK +70%, ASPD +40, Block +2; While this skill is active, this unit only takes 50% of incoming damage, with the remaining amount dealt as HP loss over 20 seconds after this skill ends

skill_1.descSkill:
Can switch between the original state and the following state:
Attack interval slightly increased, ATK +10%, attacks slow the target for 0.7 seconds

skill_2.descSkill: ASPD +10, less likely to be attacked by enemies, all allies within attack range gain Talent 1 effect while skill is active

skill_3.descSkill:
ATK +90%, attack range and Crystal Barrier shatter damage range increase; Crystal Barrier damage threshold increases to 1.5x. Whenever an attack defeats an enemy, immediately shatter the Crystal Barrier and create a new one
Skill can be manually deactivated (skill can be interrupted at any time)

skill_1.descSkill:
Spends 1 Coin; the next attack restores HP equal to 25% of ATK to a friendly unit within the surrounding 8 tiles with less than 70% HP
A maximum of 1 Coin may be held while this Skill is equipped

skill_2.descSkill:
Spends 1 Coin to place a Champagne Bomb on a ground tile within range that is passable and can be deployed upon; the Champagne Bomb deals 140% of ATK as Physical damage to the first target it comes in contact with, and Slows for 2 seconds
The Champagne Bomb deals damage 1 additional time after having been deployed for 3 seconds; a maximum of 3 Coins may be held while this Skill is equipped

skill_3.descSkill:
Attacks hit twice, and gain 1 Coin upon defeating an enemy; when skill is manually deactivated, all Coins will be spent to randomly attack enemies in a frontal area. Each Coin spent in this manner hits once for 80% of ATK as Physical damage and knocks the target back slightly
Unlimited duration, can be manually deactivated at any time; a maximum of 10 Coins may be held while this Skill is equipped

skill_1.descSkill:
Passive Effect: Whenever a Servant of Lamentation is created or upgraded, all surrounding enemies take 250% of Necrass's ATK as Arts damage
Active Effect: Resummons all Servants of Lamentation immediately; if there are none on the field, summons 1

skill_2.descSkill: Puts up to 2 enemies in range to Sleep, dealing 70% ATK as Arts damage to the targets every 0.5 seconds; defeating a target during the skill will summon 2 additional Servants of Lamentation

skill_3.descSkill:
Passive Effect: A single Servant of Lamentation takes on a special form, which can only be upgraded using this skill up to 6 times
Active Effect: Immediately deals 450% ATK as Arts damage to all enemies in range, then consumes a Servant of Lamentation to upgrade the special Servant and restore 20% of its Max HP (effect doubles if consumed Servant is upgraded); repeats 2 times

skill_2.descSkill: Prioritizing ground Operators, gives 1 ally 3 fireballs with the following effect: Every 1.5 seconds, deals 130% of Reed the Flame Shadow's ATK as Arts damage to an enemy, triggering her Trait but only on that ally.

skill_3.descSkill:
Attacks hit 2 enemies; ATK +10%; Talent 1 activation chance increases to 100%; enemies with the Cinder effect take 10% of Reed the Flame Shadow's ATK as Arts damage per second, and when defeated deal 90% of ATK as Arts damage and inflict Cinder to nearby enemies
Cinder lasts until this skill expires

skill_1.descSkill: The next attack deals 160% of ATK as Physical damage twice to up to 5 nearby ground enemies

skill_2.descSkill:
Slash 2 times at up to 5 ground enemies ahead, or slash 3 times when attacking blocked enemies. Talent trigger rate increased to 100%, and each slash deals 220% of ATK as Physical damage
Can store 2 charges

skill_3.descSkill: Slash 10 times, each dealing 150% of ATK as Physical damage to up to 5 enemies. Talent trigger chance increases to 100%, and continuously drags enemies towards self, with moderate force. Then deal 300% of ATK as Physical damage once, and drag enemies towards self with significant force

skill_1.descSkill: The next attack deals 100% ATK as Physical damage, and causes the target to Levitate for 1 seconds, then deals 100% ATK as Physical damage to it again

skill_2.descSkill:
Deals 280% ATK as Physical damage to up to 4 ground enemies in front, and cause targets with 3 or less Weight to Levitate for 1 seconds
Can store 2 charges

skill_3.descSkill: Deals 200% ATK as Physical damage to all nearby ground enemies, and cause them to Levitate for 2 seconds, then bombard 8 times, each hit dealing 180% ATK as Physical damage to all enemies in a small area around a random target
